title: How Capsella followed its lonely heart

title_detail.value: How Capsella followed its lonely heart

summary: The Brassicaceae plant family boasts a stunning diversity of fruit shapes. But even in this cosmopolitan company, the heart-shaped seed pods of the Capsella genus stand out.
